channel.title: This should be easy to answer
channel.description:
How can I make the character customization window (makeover wizard) pop up the first time you log in? allowing you to pick you character looks before you begin playing.
Cheers

item.title: This should be easy to answer
item.dc:creator: @zRickyz zRickyz
item.description:
@zRickyz wrote:

Thanks guys, much appreciated. If anyone is looking at this thread down the road for help. I was using Project Insanity. Go into PlayerAssistant.java and search for public void addStarter() { and place the code Dan put under that.

Read full topic
item.source: This should be easy to answer

item.title: This should be easy to answer
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

Wherever your server handles first time log-ins. Add this

c.getPA().showInterface(3559); c.canChangeAppearance = true;

Read full topic
item.source: This should be easy to answer

item.title: This should be easy to answer
item.dc:creator: @zRickyz zRickyz
item.description:
@zRickyz wrote:

I apologize for being a noob. But I don’t know the code or where it should be placed. I’m just using PI to mess around and make a server for me and a few friends to play on, I know some basic stuff but I’ve mainly been following tuts for things to add. Couldn’t find a tut for this though. Thanks for the help I appreciate it

Read full topic
item.source: This should be easy to answer

item.title: This should be easy to answer
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

Senf frame 116, easy fix mate. Reply if you have any issue.s.

Read full topic
